text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 86553008 (Immunosuppressive therapy)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 76334006 (Immunotherapy)

name: ImmunosuppressiveImmunomodulatoryTherapy
title: Immunosuppressive Immunomodulatory Therapy
description: Immunosuppressive and immunomodulatory procedures / therapies codes
